title: Start
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble ALLISON>>Hey, Brynn, how many fingers am I holding up?
[[25.6!|WTF]]
[[Um... zero?|Zero]]

title: CheckAllisonOpinion
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble LANCE>>Hey, guys! What's going on?
<<if $AllisonLikesYou is true>>
<<activateSpeechBubble ALLISON>>Brynn's being really cool!
<<elseif $AllisonLikesYou is false>>
<<activateSpeechBubble ALLISON>>I dunno, Brynn's, like, stupid, or something.
<<endif>>
